title: Beyhadh actors Jennifer Winget and Aneri Vajani love to hang out together; see pics : Soaps, News - India Today
text:
Beyhadh actors Jennifer Winget and Aneri Vajani love to hang out together; see pics The TV stars are really good friends. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - Jennifer Winget and Aneri Vajani. Picture courtesy: Instagram/vajanianeri 
Beyhadh stars Jennifer Winget aka Maya and Aneri Vajani aka Saanjh might be each other's rivals on screen, but in real life, the two are close friends. 
Yes, you read that right. 
Jennifer recently posted a picture of herself with her co-star Aneri, and both of them looked adorable in the said picture. 
Have a look: A photo posted by Jennifer Winget (@jenniferwinget1) on Feb 12, 2017 at 4:38am PST Jennifer posted the photograph on social media site Instagram and wrote, "Talk about transit times, never a dull moment when we team up together @vajanianeri."
Even Aneri posted a picture on her account recently of Jennifer and herself, and it was super-sweet. 
See it for yourself: A photo posted by Aneri Vajani (@vajanianeri) on Jan 26, 2017 at 6:46am PST Aneri captioned the picture as, "I love this picha Wingee ! #Hottie!"
May the bond never break. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
